org.apache.logging.log4j.spi

Class MessageFactory2Adapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.MessageFactory2Adapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageFactory, MessageFactory2

    public class MessageFactory2Adapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageFactory2
    Adapts a legacy MessageFactory to the new MessageFactory2 interface.
    Since:
    2.6
